findings.title: Revisited Logic to Distribute WOM emissions in MasterWombat
findings.description: The `MasterWombatV3` contract's `_updatePool()` routine accumulates `accWomPerShare/ accWomPerFactorShare` based on the new `rewardRate`, instead of the expected old `rewardRate`.

findings.title: Timely massUpdatePools During basePartition Update
findings.description: In the MasterWombatV3 contract, if the call to massUpdatePools() is not immediately invoked before the new basePartition gets effective, certain situations may be crafted to create an unfair reward distribution.

findings.title: Timely Update of base/voteIndex in resumeAll()
findings.description: In the `resumeAll()` routine, it doesn't catch up the `supplyBaseIndex/supplyVoteIndex` of each paused gauge to the latest, resulting in un-distributed rewards still being available.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the Wombat protocol, there is a privileged account, i.e., `owner`, that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the system-wide operations.
